tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  GROUP PROJECTS  GET READY TO READ
comments: Lindsey is the type of teacher that will help and assist you so long as you reach out to him. His class is well-organized and he is always prepared for any questions/concerns. He adds humor to the classroom, which is a bonus to creating a fun environment. In terms of his workload, to put it simply: read, research, write, and repeat.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: GROUP PROJECTS  CARING  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Lindsey is an extremely friendly and well-organized teacher. He is very understanding and loves to help you out if you are feeling lost. However, this doesn\'t mean you can slack off. Lots of writing assignments but clear expectations. Great teacher and inspirational man :)

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: GROUP PROJECTS  GET READY TO READ
comments: Lindsey Wilkinson is a great teacher. He tries his best to help his students succeed in class. If you read all the assigned readings on time, you\'ll get an easy A. However, prepare yourself for group projects. I got an A- because my group couldn\'t collaborate well and were lazy in completing their assigned work.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: There were many assignments to do throughout the course, but as long as you read the material than it is fairly easy. She had great lectures for an online class, and the readings were very scholarly and fun to read. I recommend if you don\'t mind somewhat of a heavy workload.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)
comments: 2 tests, 2 response papers. 2 extra credits opportunity. tests are same as study guides. in class assignments; goes over the class assignments before having students turning it in. don\'t buy the books; waste of $$. i never touched it. they only want you to read to have in class discussions but i don\'t participate.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Tough class, first of all she is very unclear on assignments and due dates. Her tests are confusing and review sheets are even more so confusing. I was lost the whole term and when I met up with her she just mumbled and didn\'t really help me understand. She seemed very uncomfortable the whole term and like she just wanted to leave.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Lindsey is a wonderful prof. Contrary to most reviewers Lindsy is a guy, by the way. He offered about 20 points of extra credit to our class, so that was awesome. He has very clear guidelines and expectations for class assignments and even posted some examples. Exams should be studied for, but aren\'t too difficult. Would take his class again.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I loved Lindsey\'s class & her as a teacher. She kept it interesting & entertaining & genuinely seemed to care about her students. She is very straight forward with her expectations & extremely helpful. I cannot talk her up enough. It was an easy A, but I found myself absorbing more info than usual because of her knack for relevant topic selection.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I really enjoyed this class because of the content and the discussions that went on in class. Our response papers were basically up to us to give our opinions. The guidelines and assignments for this course were pretty unclear, and sometimes the professor tended to mumble and talk too fast, but other than that I really enjoyed the class.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Pretty good teacher. Allowed a note card for the test. Explained topics well with interesting media (like video clips and stuff) to help illustrate points.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)
comments: This is the easiest class I have taken at PSU. She is really funny and makes class enjoyable. The study guide were the exact questions for the tests and we went over it in class. Take her class!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I liked this class. Lindsey is quite knowledgeable and friendly. 2 multiple choice exams, 6 in class assignments, 2 short response papers. Lectures are a little boring sometimes because they are straight power point from the text. Tests are honestly a little too easy for my liking. Overall though, I enjoyed it and learned a good deal.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Interesting course, interesting professor. Honestly, if you printed out the powerpoints, you didn\'t need to do the course reading because she went over it all in lecture. She\'s funny and intelligent. As some people mentioned, she does read off her slides, she also can answer any question that she\'s asked. Plenty of opportunity for extra credit.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)
comments: This class was so easy! You just had to show up, listen, and you got an A. She assigns readings for every class, but you don\'t need to read them because she goes over them in class. Also, her class was always so funny and interesting! It was my favorite class this term! I definitely recommend her class!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Interesting class. Professor is informative & clear but keeps it fun. Posts all lectures on D2L. Utilizes the textbook, other readings, films, & online articles. Attendance not mandatory & it\'s hard not to do well in this class. I recommend it.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I loved the class! Her powerpoints are very straightforward and her expectations are as well. Personable lecturer and her assignments are pretty easy. Reading for most classes but she goes over them in detail during class so I haven\'t done much of it at all and got a 96% on the midterm. Overall great!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)
comments: For people to say that she is unclear about what she wants is crazy, she is super clear about what she wants. She drives home all of the things she expects you to know in class. She is felxible about many things, you just have to talk to her, and yes she does respond to emails. She may mumble from time to time, but I would definitely recommend her

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I like the professor. She is very knowledgeable, nice and has a sense of humor. I would recommend her.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)
comments: It is difficult to not get an A+ in this course. Super-easy and the professor is really nice. There were four different books which altogether cost me $60, I quit reading them after week three. You do need them for the last assignment though, which is easy. Easy to get points as long as you show up to class from time to time.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I took Marriage & Intimacy, a sociology class for the family studies cluster. This class was really easy as long as you did the work and paid attention. Reading every assigned passage in the textbook isn\'t really necessary as long as you get a basic idea. Her exams are easy. She has a good sense of humor, too.
